comment: In an algebraic closure system whose closure operator has the exchange property, if two independent sets have equal closure, they are equinumerous. See ~ mreexfidimd for the finite case and ~ acsinfdimd for the infinite case. This is a special case of Theorem 4.2.2 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 87. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
